Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraAdmin
Namespace: "urn:zimbraAdmin"
LockoutMailbox SOAP Command

Puts the mailbox of the specified account into maintenance lockout or removes it from maintenance lockout

Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required true

LockoutMailboxRequest

    <LockoutMailboxRequest [op="{operation}"]> ## LockoutMailboxRequest
        <account name="{name}" /> ## Name
    </LockoutMailboxRequest>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <LockoutMailboxRequest> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
@op Optional (0 or 1) Type:String
one of 'start' or 'end'
/account Required (only 1) Account email address
/account@name Required (only 1) Type:String
Name

LockoutMailboxResponse

    <LockoutMailboxResponse /> ## LockoutMailboxResponse
